item.title: When Do You Need a Structural Assessment?
item.description: A guide for property owners and contractors on when a structural engineering assessment is required â€” and why it matters for safety and project approvals.

item.title: Riverside Towers
item.description: A 42-story mixed-use residential tower that redefines the Long Island City skyline with a hybrid structural system combining post-tensioned concrete and structural steel.

item.title: Metro Transit Hub
item.description: Structural rehabilitation and modernization of a major transit facility in Newark, NJ, including seismic retrofitting and ADA-compliant platform upgrades.

item.title: Historic Brownstone Restoration
item.description: Structural restoration of a landmark 1890s brownstone in Brooklyn Heights, preserving original character while enabling a full interior renovation.

item.title: About
item.description: CityScape Engineering is a structural engineering firm serving New York, New Jersey, and Connecticut with decades of expertise across all construction types.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Get in touch with CityScape Engineering for structural engineering services in New York, New Jersey, and Connecticut.
